content: >**a messenger bag for 20cm/8 little tearoom bears ** this magical little bag is decorated with twisted stitches reverse stocking stitch and garter stitch and is finished with a tiny wooden button to keep those most special messages safe on their journey experiment with different yarn weights and needle sizes for varying sized bags >**included in the pattern ** list of all materials required step by step instructions in progress photos useful links to techniques and resources >**the little tearoom bear messengers can be found here ** little tearoom bears m1 1 in the round little tearoom bears m2 2 back & forth >**more places to find mary jane s tearoom ** mjt ravelry group 3 mary jane s tearoom blog 4 mjt facebook knitting group 5 you are welcome to contact me at any time if you have any questions either before or after downloading your pattern copyright © mary jane s tearoom all rights reserved 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/little-tearoom-bears-method-1-8 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/little-tearoom-bears-method-2-8 3 https //www ravelry com/groups/mary-janes-tearoom 4 https //www maryjanestearoom com/ 5 https //www facebook com/groups/957066501434674
